description: Teaches Polymorph: Serpent.
name: Tome of Polymorph: Serpent

spell.name: Polymorph
spell.description: Transforms the enemy into a harmless serpent, forcing it to slither around for up to 50 sec.  While wandering, the serpent cannot attack or cast spells but will regenerate very quickly.  Any damage will transform the target back into its normal form.  Only one target can be polymorphed at a time.  Only works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters.

description: Teaches Arcane Brilliance with a Dalaran flair.
name: Tome of Dalaran Brilliance

spell.name: Dalaran Brilliance
spell.description:
Infuses the target with brilliance, increasing their spell power by 10% and their critical strike chance by 5% for 1 hour.  



If target is in your party or raid, all party and raid members will be affected.

description: Teaches Polymorph: Black Cat.
name: Tome of Polymorph: Black Cat

spell.name: Polymorph
spell.description: Transforms the enemy into a harmless black cat, forcing it to pussyfoot around for up to 50 sec.  While wandering, the cat cannot attack or cast spells but will regenerate very quickly.  Any damage will transform the target back into its normal form.  Only one target can be polymorphed at a time.  Only works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters.

name: Tome of Polymorph: Rabbit

spell.name: Polymorph
spell.description: Transforms the enemy into a harmless rabbit, forcing it to scamper around for up to 50 sec.  While wandering, the rabbit cannot attack or cast spells but will regenerate very quickly.  Any damage will transform the target back into its normal form.  Only one target can be polymorphed at a time.  Only works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters.

description: Teaches Polymorph: Turkey
name: Tome of Polymorph: Turkey

spell.name: Polymorph
spell.description: Transforms the enemy into a harmless Turkey, forcing it to waddle around for up to 50 sec.  While waddling, the turkey cannot attack or cast spells but will regenerate very quickly.  Any damage will transform the target back into its normal form.  Only one target can be polymorphed at a time.  Only works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters.

spell.description: Permanently enchants a melee weapon to sometimes increase your Strength or Agility by 1,650 when dealing melee damage.  Your highest stat is always chosen.  Requires a level 372 or higher item.
